column4: Does someone know a repo where I can find newer packages (for example libc6-2.3.4 not 2.3.2 as in the default repos)? Please, i started pulling my hair out.
if your not using the default  repository   desktops  your kinda on your own

kde3.5 needs libc6-2.3.4, in the repos there is only libc6-2.3.2 (just an example). I think that there has to be a place where I can find those newer packages because there a lot of people using kde3.5 on kubuntu. They had to get those from somewhere...
maybe #kubuntu  would be a better channel
